mapper.update: UPDATE servicees SET s_status = 2 , s_lastTime = default WHERE s_id = #{id} AND s_status=1
mapper.select: SELECT s.*,type.`dd_valueId` `s_Type.dd_ValueId`,type.`dd_valueName` `s_Type.dd_ValueName`,status.`dd_valueId` `s_status.dd_ValueId`,status.`dd_valueName` `s_status.dd_ValueName`,op.`e_realName` `s_operator.e_RealName`,pro.`e_realName` `s_processor.e_RealName` FROM servicees s INNER JOIN data_dictionary `type` ON type.`dd_valueId`=s.`s_type` INNER JOIN data_dictionary `status` ON status.`dd_valueId`=s.`s_status` INNER JOIN employees op ON op.`e_id`=s.`s_operator` INNER JOIN employees pro ON pro.`e_id`=s.`s_processor` WHERE type.`dd_typeCode`='service_type' AND status.`dd_typeCode`='service_status' AND s.s_id=#{id}
